oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fifth Avenue North, Toward Union Street by Night, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1910s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A street scene along Fifth Avenue N as pictured on the west side looking towards Union Street, in downtown Nashville, circa the 1910s. Several businesses are pictured ncluding Fish Bros. Co., Skalowski’s Candy, S.H. Kress and others. Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills, Ridley, 1934-
Skalowski’s Candy (Nashville, Tenn.); S.H. Kress & Co. Skalowski's (Ice cream parlor : Nashville, Tenn.); Fish Brothers Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
